channel.title: People are dying by random
channel.description:
when im in my server, people after fighting in the fun PKing area (basicly a small room where players can PK without the risk of loosing items)
1: either they are dying by monsters killing them then reciving a message from the client saying they were killed by a player 2: it is a Bug that i need help with
its ChassyScape soucre BTW.
